description: Made for hiking and everyday adventures, this breathable and waterproof hardshell holds back on nothing but weight. Its recycled polyester shell [AM1] is solution dyed for increased sustainability. Added stretch and a mesh lining offer impeccable comfort. An adjustable hood and two zippered pockets keep things practical. The perfect choice for big adventures with a small environmental impact.
name: Mammut Alto HS Hooded Jacket - Mens
